name: Sea Eagle Simulator
description:
Survive against shark, storks, duck, owl, crocodile, and other animals in this high action bird simulator. The goal of the game is survival. Take control of this powerful Sea Eagle and hunt down your natural enemies. Fly over the ocean looking for your next tasty meal. Includes people and animals with fun sounds and animations included. This bird animal simulator has been designed for all ages. Begin your quest in this ultimate game of survival!

Top App Highlights:

--5 Birds types included
--Upgrade your Sea Eagle Stamina, Strength and Speed.
--4 Different Times of Day, including rain, sunset and sunrise
--12 Adventure Included
--Huge Open World 3D Map
--6 BONUS Battles match ups

TRACK YOUR HUNTING SUCCESS
The app automatically records all your victories so you can see how well you have done.
HIGH ACTION GAMEPLAY
Fun controls and Addictive game play for hours of great animal simulation.
CHANGING GAME CONDITIONS
No two games will ever be the same. Stray dogs don't like the rain, and neither do sea eagles.

UPGRADE FOR MORE POWER
Spend your meat units to purchase upgrades for your bird.
5 BIRD BREEDS INCLUDED
Eagle, Stock, Owl, Swallow, and Duck all included
CROCODILE, BIG SHARK AND BABY SHARK
Watch out for these breaching sharks and crocs, coming from below.
HEAD TO HEAD MATCHUPS
Challenge your fighting skills against 6 different 3 on 1 battles. You either win or loose. Be prepared for a flight for survival.

This Eagle Bird animal simulator has been designed with all ages in mind. We are in the process of creating a multiplayer version so you will be able to challenge your friends.

Like us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/wildfootgames
Please check out our other 3D animal sims -Dog Survival, Dinosaur, Owl, Cheetah, Lion, Wolf, Crocodile, and Polar Bear Games. We realize the app is not perfect, and we welcome your constructive criticism.
Please email your suggestions to wildfootgames@gmail.com.
